description: a cartoon-like mage; at bottom a ship labelled Austria; standing on ship at top are two figures one called Imperator and the other Papa struggling; beneath the platform at left is a lion being crushed
inscription:
Inscription

in plate below image in black:[PROFICIA DELA SIBILLA TIBURTINA TRIBUATA I UNA GRADA PIETRA I LA/ CITA D ALTINI UNO LOCO RUINATO FATA INATI LA VENIMETO GL\'NRO SIGR ITRO X/ANI COSI COMO QUE RETRATA E SCOLPITA E FO TRASFATA AVENECIA]; below image in pencil:[1-69]; on mount in pencil lower left: [OTTLEY FACSIMILIES pl. 24]
title: A Satyrical Piece, Respecting the Chief Governments of Europe
